52238.question: How To Make an Insect Hotel
52238.gt: To make an insect hotel, pick a flat spot in your yard that gets both sun and shade, like near a large tree or hedge. Next, choose a structure for your hotel, like an old birdhouse, a wooden box, or cinder blocks. Then, fill the structure with materials that appeal to insects, such as rolled up bits of paper, straw, hay, old bark, and leaves. Finally, create small holes and crevices in the material to give the insects places to hide and take shelter.
52238.pred: To make an insect hotel, you will need a wooden box, a drill, and a hammer. First, drill holes in the box to create different sized holes for different insects. Then, hammer the box onto a wooden fence. Finally, fill the box with twigs and other materials to attract insects.

52691.question: How To Make Coconut Candy
52691.gt: To make coconut candy squares, you’ll need shredded coconut, white sugar, corn syrup, water, butter, salt, baking soda, and a small cake pan. Combine the sugar, water, and corn syrup in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring until the mixture boils. Then, add the butter, remove the mixture from the heat source, and stir in the remaining ingredients. Pour the mixture into the pan and let it set for a few hours. Then, just cut the solid into small squares and enjoy!
52691.pred: To make coconut candy, you will need to follow the steps shown in the video. First, you will need to mix coconut milk, sugar, and salt in a pot. Then, you will need to add the mixture to a bowl and mix it with a wooden spoon. After that, you will need to add the mixture to a pan and mix it with a wooden spoon. Finally, you will need to add the mixture to a bowl and mix it with a wooden spoon.

52736.question: How To Apply Makeup (for Teen Girls)
52736.gt: To do your makeup as a teen, the first thing you'll want to do is apply a foundation that matches your skin tone. Place a few dots of foundation on your face, then blend it in with a brush or makeup sponge to even out your skin tone. If you want to emphasize your eyebrows, lightly fill them in with a brow pencil or powder that matches your natural hair color. You can also brush a natural-colored eyeshadow, like soft peach or beige, over your eyelids for an everyday look. Use a brown or black eyeliner pencil to draw a thin line on your top lid to draw attention to your eyes. If you want thicker, darker lashes, apply a little brown or black mascara to your top and bottom lashes. To bring out the color in your lips, apply some lip gloss or lipstick.
52736.pred: To apply makeup for teen girls, start by applying foundation to the face using a brush. Then, apply blush to the cheeks and use a brush to apply eyeshadow. Next, use a brush to apply lipstick. Finally, use a brush to apply mascara to the eyelashes.

53129.question: How To Make Glitter Candles
53129.gt: To make glitter candles, start by removing the plastic wrap off of a votive, taper, or pillar candle. Then, paint the candle with a decoupage glue like Mod Podge, let the glue dry, then paint on another layer. Before the second layer dries, sprinkle glitter onto the candle, rotating as you pour to coat the whole candle evenly. Let the glue dry completely, then seal in the glitter with a clear, glossy, acrylic sealer.
53129.pred: To make glitter candles, you will need a jar, a candle, and glitter. First, place the candle in the jar. Then, add the glitter to the jar. Next, light the candle and let it burn for a few minutes. Finally, turn off the candle and let it cool. Once the candle has cooled, you can remove the candle from the jar and use it as a decorative candle.

53182.question: How To Make a White Chocolate Mocha
53182.gt: To make a white chocolate mocha, start by melting 3 tablespoons of white chocolate chips in a double boiler with 2 tablespoons of milk. Then, pour the melted mixture into a mug along with 1 cup of heated milk. Next, add a shot of espresso or 4 shots of strong coffee to the mug and stir everything together. Finally, top your white chocolate mocha with whipped cream before serving.
53182.pred: To make a white chocolate mocha, you will need to start by grinding the coffee beans in a grinder. Then, add the ground coffee to a cup and pour hot water over it to make the coffee. Next, add the white chocolate syrup to the coffee and stir it well. Finally, add the milk to the coffee and stir it again. You can also add whipped cream on top of the drink for a delicious and creamy white chocolate mocha.

53405.question: How To Core a Tomato
53405.gt: To core a tomato, start by rinsing it off with fresh water to get rid of dirt and debris. Pat the tomato dry, then pull off the stem with your fingers. Place the tomato upright on a cutting board, then insert a paring knife into the top center and push the blade in about 1/2 an inch deep. Hold the tomato firmly with your other hand and use the knife to cut a small circle around the center. Once you complete the circle, pull out the core and discard it!
53405.pred: To core a tomato, you can use a knife to cut off the top of the tomato and then use a spoon to scoop out the seeds and the core.

53433.question: How To Cube Bread
53433.gt: To cube bread by hand, simply pull off the crusts, then tear the bread apart into 1-inch squares. If you want neater cubes with clean edges, start by stacking the bread 2 slices high. Then, cut the slices into 4 strips lengthwise with a serrated knife. Next, turn the bread so that the cut lines are in a horizontal position, and straighten any strips that have gone askew. Finally, cut the bread into 4 more strips so that you end up with 16 cubes of even size and shape.
53433.pred: To cube bread, you need to cut the bread into small cubes. You can use a knife to cut the bread into small cubes.

53444.question: How To Cut Acorn Squash
53444.gt: In order to cut your acorn squash in half, select a sharp, study knife with an 8 to 10 inch blade. Then, place your squash lengthwise on the cutting board and cut ½ an inch off the ends of the squash. Next, place your acorn squash sliced-side down so the squash looks like it's standing up. Use a rocking or sawing motion to cut the squash right down the middle.
53444.pred: To cut acorn squash, first, cut off the ends of the squash. Then, cut the squash in half lengthwise. Next, cut the squash in half again. Finally, cut the squash into smaller pieces.

53490.question: How To Use a Mandoline
53490.gt: To use a mandoline, unfold the mandoline's legs, place them on a cutting board, and face the mandoline perpendicular to you. Next, cut the fruit or veggie in half to create a flat surface. Then, place the food in the hand guard so the flat side faces the runway and slot the hand guard over the mandoline. Finally, hold the mandoline steady with your non-dominant hand and push the food down the runway to cut one slice. Repeat this motion with even pressure to make more slices of the same thickness.
53490.pred: To use a mandoline, first, place the food item on the mandoline and hold it firmly. Then, slide the mandoline back and forth to slice the food item. Be careful not to cut yourself on the mandoline's sharp blade.

54088.question: How To Cross Hatch
54088.gt: To learn basic cross hatching, draw a series of parallel lines. Next, add a perpendicular series of lines over the first set of lines. If you want to create lighter shading, draw fewer lines spread further apart. Alternatively, make the lines thicker and add more layers closer together for darker shading. You can also add layers of cross hatching in different directions to create a subtle, rich shading.
54088.pred: To cross hatch, you need to draw parallel lines in one direction and then draw another set of parallel lines in the opposite direction. This creates a criss-cross pattern that can be used to add texture and shading to your drawings.

54096.question: How To Make a Tortillon
54096.gt: To make a tortillon, start by measuring 1 inch down the side of a piece of copy paper and marking it with a pencil. Flip the paper and mark it the same way on the other side, then connect the 2 marks with a straight line. Next, use scissors to cut along the line so you end up with 2 identical pieces of paper. Then, grasp one of the pieces by the narrowest end and roll it tightly towards the outer edge of the paper. Finally, use a piece of thick wire to push the center out so the tip is pencil-shaped, and secure the paper with a small piece of tape.
54096.pred: To make a tortillon, you will need a piece of paper, a ruler, a pencil, and a piece of tape. First, measure and mark the paper with the ruler and pencil. Then, fold the paper in half and use the tape to secure it. Finally, use the pencil to draw on the paper.

54315.question: How To Insert a Male Catheter
54315.gt: To insert a male catheter, start by washing your hands and the area around your penis with warm water and soap. Put lubricating jelly on the first 10 inches of the catheter and get into a seated position with your legs bent. Use your non-dominant hand to hold your penis straight out in front of your body and slowly insert the end of the catheter into the opening at the top of your penis. Push the catheter in about 7 to 10 inches or until urine starts to flow through it. As soon as you are done urinating, pinch the top of the catheter closed with your dominant hand and slowly pull it out. Keep the end facing upward so no urine spills out.
54315.pred: To insert a male catheter, first, clean the area around the urethral meatus with a sterile wipe. Then, place a sterile drape over the area. Next, inject local anesthetic into the urethra. After that, insert the catheter into the urethra and inflate the balloon with water. Finally, gently retract the catheter until resistance is felt.

54361.question: How To Wash Egg off a House
54361.gt: Washing egg off your house probably isn’t how you'd like to spend your time, but fortunately you can easily remove egg stains with household items. If you can, remove the excess egg before it dries, since this will be much easier. Wipe it away with a cloth or scrape it off with a dull knife. If you have a hose in your garden, spray the egg away with water. To get rid of any dried stains, try mixing 1 cup of non-bleach laundry detergent into a bucket of warm water. Then, scrub your wall with the water and a hard-bristled brush. Alternatively, mix 1 cup each of white vinegar and warm water in a spray bottle. Then, spray the egg stains with it and scrub them off with a sponge. For tougher stains, try using a paint scraper.
54361.pred: To wash egg off a house, first, you need to let the egg bake in the sun for a couple of hours. Then, fill a bucket with cold water and add a small amount of dish soap. Use a squeegee to remove the egg from the window, and then use a steel wool to clean the window. Finally, wipe the window with a rag to remove any remaining egg residue.

55245.question: How To Artificially Inseminate a Dog
55245.gt: Before artificially inseminating your dog, take it to your vet to make sure it’s in good health. If so, the vet will collect the semen and examine it to make sure the sperm cells look normal. If you don't plan on using the semen right away, ask your vet to chill or freeze it. Once the female dog is ready, the vet will use a pipette to insert the semen in to the uterus.
55245.pred: To artificially inseminate a dog, you will need a syringe, a vial of semen, and a dog. First, you will need to collect the semen from the vial and inject it into the dog's vagina. You can do this by inserting the syringe into the dog's vagina and pushing the semen into the dog's uterus. It is important to be gentle and careful when handling the dog and the syringe to avoid causing any harm.

56361.question: How To Clean a Memory Foam Pillow
56361.gt: To remove a stain from a memory foam pillow, mix equal parts water and vinegar in a spray bottle. If you want to cut the vinegar smell, add a squeeze of fresh lemon juice to the mixture. Remove the pillowcase to directly spray the stain. After 5 minutes, use a damp cloth to blot the affected area. If the stain doesn't lift immediately, repeat the process until it does. Finally, to deodorize and disinfect your pillow, hang it on a clothesline in the bright sunlight!
56361.pred: To clean a memory foam pillow, first, remove the pillow from the pillowcase. Then, sprinkle baking soda on the pillow and let it sit for a few minutes. After that, wipe the pillow with a damp cloth to remove the baking soda. Finally, place the pillow back in the pillowcase.

56404.question: How To Make a Simple Homemade Incubator for Chicks
56404.gt: If you want to raise chicks at home with an incubator, purchase a styrofoam cooler and cut a hole in one end. Then, slide the socket of a lamp and a 25 watt light bulb through the hole, and duct tape around the hole on the inside and outside of the container. Use chicken wire to divide the container in half, with the bulb on one side of the container to prevent the chicks from getting burned. Next, place a digital thermometer and humidity gauge in the box along with a bowl of water, and turn the light on to test the incubator.
56404.pred: To make a simple homemade incubator for chicks, you will need a white plastic container, a blue cloth, a thermometer, and a power source. First, place the blue cloth inside the container and add the thermometer to monitor the temperature. Then, plug in the power source and turn on the light. Next, place the eggs on top of the cloth and cover the container with a lid. Finally, adjust the temperature as needed to ensure the eggs are kept at the right temperature for incubation.

56653.question: How To Make French Dressing
56653.gt: To make a basic French dressing, start by pureeing ketchup, sugar, vinegar, water, garlic salt, black pepper, and salt in a blender. While pureeing, slowly pour 1 cup of vegetable oil in. Once all of the ingredients are incorporated, chill the dressing for a few hours before using. You can store the dressing in the refrigerator in an airtight container for 1 week.
56653.pred: To make French dressing, you will need a jar, a bottle of vinegar, a bottle of oil, a bottle of mustard, a bowl of salt, and a knife. First, pour the vinegar and oil into the jar. Then, add the mustard and salt. Next, use the knife to cut the garlic cloves and add them to the jar. Finally, shake the jar to mix all the ingredients together.

57842.question: How To Make Creamy Broccoli Soup
57842.gt: To make creamy broccoli soup, start by chopping the broccoli into small pieces. In a pan, saute an onion in olive oil until it's translucent before adding the stock and a diced potato. When the mixture starts bubbling, let it simmer for 12 minutes. Then, add the broccoli and simmer the soup for another 10 minutes. Finish by pureeing the soup with a handheld blender and adding cream and seasoning.
57842.pred: To make creamy broccoli soup, you will need to start by melting butter in a pot and adding chopped onions and celery. Cook until the onions are translucent, then add flour and stir until it forms a paste. Gradually add chicken broth and milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Add chopped broccoli and cook until it is tender. Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Blend the soup until smooth and serve hot.

58304.question: How To Make Beignets
58304.gt: To make beignets, start by dissolving yeast in a bowl of warm water and then adding evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, flour, and shortening. Then, mix everything together until a dough forms and chill the dough in the fridge for 24 hours. Next, roll the dough out flat and cut it into small squares. When you're finished cutting the dough, heat some vegetable oil in a large saucepan and fry a few of the dough squares at a time for 2-3 minutes. Finally, top the beignets with powdered sugar before serving.
58304.pred: To make beignets, you will need to mix flour, sugar, and water in a bowl. Then, add butter and mix until it forms a dough. After that, roll the dough into a ball and place it in a bowl. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let it sit for 2 hours. Once the dough has risen, roll it out and cut it into small pieces. Place the pieces in a fryer and fry until they are golden brown. Finally, dust the beignets with powdered sugar and serve with a cup of coffee.

58634.question: How To Test Soil pH
58634.gt: To test your soil’s pH, first, go online or to your local garden center and buy pH test strips, which are also called litmus paper. Then, take a handful of the soil you want to test and mix it with just enough distilled water to give it the consistency of a milkshake. Next, put the test strip into the dirt mixture and hold it there for 20-30 seconds. Remove it from the dirt and dip it quickly into distilled water to clean it off. Finally, you can determine your soil’s pH by comparing the strip's coloration to the color-coded key that came with the test strips.
58634.pred: To test soil pH, you can use a soil testing kit. First, collect a soil sample from the garden bed. Then, mix the soil with water in a container. Next, add a few drops of the soil solution to the pH test kit. Finally, compare the color of the solution to the chart provided in the kit to determine the pH level of the soil.

59313.question: How To Make a Green Smoothie
59313.gt: To make a green smoothie, start by pouring liquid such as water, soy milk, or regular milk into a blender. Next, add chopped fruit and greens, and pulse the mixture a few times to break up the ingredients. Afterwards, blend on a low speed for 30 seconds, then switch to the high speed and blend until everything is smooth. At this point, add some ice cubes or frozen fruit if you want your smoothie extra cold, and blend until smooth.
59313.pred: To make a green smoothie, you can follow the steps shown in the video. First, you need to blend spinach, cucumber, banana, and dates in a blender. Then, you can add coconut milk and lemon juice to the blender and blend again. Finally, you can pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy it.

59726.question: How To Refinish Particle Board Cabinets
59726.gt: If your particle board cabinets are looking worse for wear, you can easily refinish them yourself. All you’ll need is painter’s tape, sandpaper, primer, paint, and a clear varnish. Use an oil-based primer and an acrylic or oil-based paint. Before you begin, cover any areas you don’t want painted with tape. You’ll need to sand the surfaces, apply a coat of primer, then paint your cabinets. It’ll take 24 to 48 hours for each coat of your primer and paint to dry. You might need more than 1 coat of paint to achieve the color you want. After your final coat has dried, apply a layer of clear varnish to protect the paint.
59726.pred: To refinish particle board cabinets, you can follow the steps shown in the video. First, sand the surface of the cabinets to remove any old finish and create a smooth surface. Then, apply a primer to the cabinets to help the new finish adhere better. After the primer dries, you can apply the new finish, such as paint or stain, using a brush or roller. Make sure to apply the finish evenly and let it dry completely before using the cabinets.

59773.question: How To Make Curry Puffs
59773.gt: To make curry puffs, start by boiling potatoes until tender and cutting them into small pieces. Next, blanch peas and sauté onions. Add curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, black pepper, and salt to the pan with the peas and potatoes. Then, to make the pastry, mix flour, salt, and shortening in a bowl, add warm water, and knead. After allowing the dough to rest, roll it out, cut it in circles, and fill them with the potato mixture. Pinch the stuffed circles closed and fry them in oil until golden brown.
59773.pred: To make curry puffs, you will need to start by chopping up the chicken and potatoes. Then, you will need to cook the chicken and potatoes in a wok with oil. After that, you will need to mix the ingredients together and place them on a sheet of dough. Finally, you will need to fry the dough in a pot of oil until it is golden brown.

59986.question: How To Build an Ant Farm
59986.gt: To build an ant farm, start by placing a lidded glass jar inside a larger one and filling in the area between them with a mixture of slightly damp dirt and sand. Next, find some ants in your yard and gather them up using a large spoon. Once you’ve collected about 25 ants, put them in the large jar with the dirt. Then, put the lid on the large jar and use an awl or sharp knife to poke tiny holes in it so the ants can breathe. Finally, keep the jar covered with a black cloth while you’re not watching them to encourage them to dig closer to the sides of the jar.
59986.pred: To build an ant farm, you will need a plastic container, a plastic sheet, a plastic tube, and a plastic bottle. First, cut the plastic sheet into a specific shape and place it inside the container. Then, attach the plastic tube to the plastic bottle and place it inside the container. Finally, add the plastic bottle to the container and place the lid on top.

60376.question: How To Make a Fish Trap
60376.gt: The best way to make a fish trap depends on what you fish for. Make a smaller trap if you fish for minnows or pan fish. Make a larger trap if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Arrange 12 pieces of lumber into the shape of a cube and nail them together with a hammer. Wrap wire mesh around 3 sides the frame if you fish for minnows or pan fish, and wrap poultry netting around the 3 sides if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Secure the mesh or netting to the edges of the frame with snap ties. Then, create a funnel with the mesh or netting and use it to cover the open side of the cube.
60376.pred: To make a fish trap, you will need a plastic bottle, a knife, and a piece of string. First, cut the plastic bottle in half. Then, cut a small hole in the bottom of the bottle. Next, tie a piece of string to the bottle and attach it to a stick. Finally, place the bottle in the water and wait for the fish to swim inside.

60911.question: How To Tie Dye Using Rit Powder
60911.gt: If you want to tie dye some of your fabrics, Rit powder will give you more control over mixing colors. Start by gathering your supplies, including plastic bags, newspaper, gloves, rubber bands, a large tub, hot water, and vinegar or salt. Then, bunch up and twist your fabric and wrap rubber bands around it to hold it together and create your tie-dye pattern. Place rubber bands around the twisted fabric at intervals to separate the colors. Next, fill a 3-gallon bucket with your dye solution, which you'll want to make according to the instructions on the box. To make sure your colors are vibrant, add 1 cup of salt or vinegar to your solution. Either dip your fabric into the desired colors or submerge your entire piece into the bucket for a single color. Once you’ve applied all of your colors, rinse your fabric under hot water. Then, gradually decrease the water temperature until the water runs clear.
60911.pred: To tie dye using rit powder, first, you need to prepare the dye by mixing it with water. Then, you can use a plastic bag to tie the fabric and dip it into the dye. After that, you can rinse the fabric with water to remove the excess dye. Finally, you can hang the fabric to dry.

62185.question: How To Clean Upholstery with a Steam Cleaner
62185.gt: To clean upholstery with a steam cleaner, start by filling the steam cleaner with warm water and upholstery cleaner. Then, remove any pillows and cushions on your couch and use the steam cleaner to clean those first. To use the steam cleaner, simply press the button to spray the steam onto the upholstery and then vacuum up the moisture with the hose. When you're finished with the pillows and cushions, steam clean the rest of the couch and then let it air dry.
62185.pred: To clean upholstery with a steam cleaner, first, spray the cleaner on the upholstery and then use a brush to scrub the area. After that, wipe the area with a towel to remove any excess cleaner.

62187.question: How To Fix Sagging Sofa Cushions
62187.gt: To fix sagging sofa cushions, start by unzipping the cushions, or opening them with a thread cutter if they don’t have zippers. Then, if your cushions have loose stuffing, add polyester fiberfill and distribute it evenly with your hands to plump up the cushions. Alternatively, wrap quilt batting around cushions that have pillow-like stuffing to give them more body. Finally, zip your cushions back up or sew them back together, then put them back on your sofa.
62187.pred: To fix sagging sofa cushions, you can follow these steps. First, remove the cushions from the sofa. Then, take a box of stuffing and fill the cushions with it. After that, sew the cushions back together. Finally, place the cushions back on the sofa.

62194.question: How To Reupholster a Couch
62194.gt: To reupholster a couch, start by removing the old fabric, starting at the bottom of the sofa and working your way up. Next, cut out pieces of fabric that correspond with each section of the couch using the old fabric as a guide. Then, sew the seams together with a sewing machine and heavy duty thread. Finally, attach the fabric to the couch with a staple gun, working from the innermost parts of the couch outward.
62194.pred: To reupholster a couch, first, remove the cushions and the old fabric. Then, use a staple gun to attach the new fabric to the frame. Finally, put the cushions back on the couch.

62332.question: How To Keep Ribbon from Fraying
62332.gt: Fabric ribbons tend to fray and separate at the edges, but you can keep your ribbon from fraying by cutting it at a diagonal and applying nail polish or glue at the edges. Snip the edge of your ribbon at a 45-degree angle or cut it in an inverted “v” shape, which will help with the fraying. Apply a thin layer of clear nail polish to the edges of the ribbon to help the fabric stay together. You can also apply an anti-fraying spray or clear craft glue to the tip of your ribbon to keep the threads together.
62332.pred: To prevent ribbon from fraying, you can use a lighter to burn the ends of the ribbon. This will help to seal the frayed edges and prevent them from unraveling. Additionally, you can use a glue gun to apply a small amount of glue to the ends of the ribbon, which will also help to prevent fraying.

62393.question: How To Make Grain Free Dog Treats
62393.gt: To make grain-free dog treats, remove the peel from 1 banana, put the fruit in a large bowl, and mash it with a fork. Next, add 3 tablespoons of smooth peanut butter and 1 large egg and stir until they're fully incorporated. Then, put 1¾ cup of garbanzo flour in a separate bowl, pour the banana mixture into it, and stir until the mixture forms a dough. Roll out the dough to be ¼ inch thick and use a knife or cookie cutter to cut out the individual treats. Finally, bake the treats at 300 degrees Fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes until they're golden brown.
62393.pred: To make grain-free dog treats, you will need to mash a banana, add peanut butter, an egg, and flour to a bowl. Mix the ingredients together and then place the mixture on a baking sheet. Bake the mixture in the oven for 30 minutes at 175 degrees. Once the treats are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool before serving them to your dog.

62620.question: How To Make a Bottle Tree
62620.gt: A bottle tree is a great way to reuse old bottles and create an eye-catching sculpture. You’ll need at least a dozen wine and spirits bottles to make your bottle tree, but you can add bottles to the tree over time. You’ll also need a small dead tree, a premade bottle tree frame, or a frame you made yourself. All you need to do is remove the labels from the bottles, then slide them onto the branches so they're upside down. If you have a lot of bottles and the tree starts to waver, cement the tree into place or weigh down its base so it doesn’t blow over in a strong wind.
62620.pred: To make a bottle tree, you will need a wooden post, blue plastic bottles, and a drill. First, drill holes into the wooden post at different heights. Then, insert the blue plastic bottles into the holes. You can also add other decorations to the tree, such as birdhouses or wind chimes. Finally, place the bottle tree in your garden or backyard and enjoy the unique and eco-friendly decoration.

62635.question: How To Make Wine Bottle Accent Lights
62635.gt: For a fun, creative, and customizable way to add a gentle glow to any room in your house, make your own wine bottle accent lights. You'll need to prepare the bottles by washing them in hot, soapy water and allowing them to dry completely. Plan to get a jig or base to hold your bottle steady so you can drill a hole in the center of the stopper. Also, you'll need to find a drill spot on the bottle, preferably somewhere on the back near the bottom. Once you drill your hole, you'll want to sand it down to avoid any sharp edges. You can then feed your string of lights into the bottle through the hole you just drilled. Then, plan to use the stopper to protect the cord from being cut by the raw glass edges of the hole.

62830.question: How To Clean with Rubbing Alcohol
62830.gt: Rubbing alcohol is a great product for cleaning and disinfecting your everyday items like mirrors, keyboards, and glass. Avoid cleaning your electronic screens, delicate fabrics, or finished wood, since the alcohol can damage them. Before you apply the rubbing alcohol, wipe your item with a clean, damp rag to get rid of any dirt or grease. Then, rinse your cloth and dampen it with rubbing alcohol. Wipe your item gently with the rag to get rid of any stains and sterilize it. To get into small crevices, try using a Q-tip. If there’s any residue left from the alcohol, wipe it up with a clean rag.

62844.gt: To make a natural disinfectant out of vinegar, mix 1 part water, 1 part vinegar, and 5-15 drops of your favorite essential oil, like lemon, chamomile, or lavender. For general cleaning, pour the mixture into a spray bottle. If you would prefer to use disinfectant wipes, pour the vinegar mixture into a large glass jar and submerge 15-20 small squares of cloth in the liquid. When you’re ready to use a wipe, remove it from the jar and wring it out, then use it to wipe surfaces clean.

63396.gt: To make bhatura, start by mixing active dry yeast in warm water and allowing it to sit for 10 minutes. Next, in a large bowl, mix maida, sooji, sugar, and salt. Then, add the yeast solution, oil, and yogurt, stirring all of the ingredients together until a soft dough forms. Once everything is combined, cover the bowl and let the dough rise in a warm location for 3 to 4 hours. 64286.question: How To Clean Felt
64286.gt: To clean felt, start by dabbing a small amount of gentle dish soap, such as Ivory or Dawn, directly onto the stain and blotting it with a soft, damp cloth. Alternatively, try using diluted white vinegar for stains that are particularly stubborn. Then, rinse the cloth with cool water to remove any soap or vinegar and use it to blot the stained felt again. Repeat this process until all the soap or vinegar has been rinsed from the felt. Afterwards, firmly press a clean, dry towel onto the area to soak up any excess moisture before allowing the felt to dry in a cool place.

71215.question: How To Cut Strawberries for Every Occasion
71215.gt: While you may want to cut your strawberries differently depending on the occasion, always start by cleaning and hulling them. Rinse your berries under cool water and pick the green top stems off by gently twisting and pulling them. Put the tip of a paring knife into the top of the berry just outside the white center part and slide the knife around to cut out the hull, which is the most bitter part of the strawberry. For a quick snack, pie, tart, or smoothie, cut your strawberries in half vertically. If you’d prefer smaller pieces for a fruit salad, then slice them in quarters. You can also cut your berries into vertical slices if you want thinner pieces for a topping on a dessert or oatmeal.

71239.question: How To Make Raspberry Puree
71239.gt: If you want to make raspberry puree on the stove, combine your raspberries, sugar, and lemon juice in a large saucepan. Place the mixture on the stove on medium heat for about 10 minutes. Stirring frequently. Once the raspberries are completely broken down, pour the mixture through a sieve or a strainer to remove the seeds. Serve the puree warm or chill it if you prefer a thicker puree. Raspberry puree will stay good for at least a week in the refrigerator.

71250.question: How To Build a Birdhouse
71250.gt: To build a birdhouse, start by picking up some untreated wood and galvanized screws from your home improvement store. Use a bandsaw to cut your wood into several separate pieces, then paint or stain them however you'd like before assembling them to create the birdhouse structure. Once your birdhouse is complete, mount it to a pole or to the side of a building at least 5 feet off the ground!

72399.question: How To Kill Fleas With Dawn Dishsoap
72399.gt: If your pet has fleas, a Dawn dishsoap bath is a gentle remedy that can help get rid of them. Fill a bathtub or basin with lukewarm water that’s only about as deep as your pet’s belly, then put your pet in the water. Use your hands to wet your pet’s fur through to the skin, but be careful to avoid its eyes and ears. Next, use a little dish soap to lather up your pet’s fur. For most dogs and cats, 2 or 3 tablespoons of soap are a good starting point, but you can use more for a larger pet or a severe flea infestation. Work the soap into its fur with your fingers or a brush and make sure it gets all the way down to the skin. Let the dish soap sit for about 5 minutes, then rinse your pet thoroughly with clean water and rub it dry with a towel. If you still notice fleas on your pet after the bath, repeat the process.

72919.question: How To Make Fairy Cakes
72919.gt: To make fairy cakes, start by beating 110 grams of softened, unsalted butter until it’s light and fluffy. Then, add 110 grams of caster sugar and continue mixing until combined. Next, beat together 2 eggs and 1 teaspoon of vanilla before gradually adding the liquid mixture to the butter-sugar mixture. After that, fold in 110 grams of flour, then add 1-2 tablespoons of milk, or enough that the batter drips slowly from a spoon turned upside down. Finally, fill cupcake tins ½ full of batter and bake your fairy cakes at 180°C for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown.

73271.question: How To Clean Your Dog's ID Tag
73271.gt: To clean your dog’s ID tag, soak it in a bowl of 2 cups of warm water and 1 tablespoon of washing up liquid once a week. After a few minutes, scrub the tag with a soft sponge until it turns shiny. If you still see dirt on the lettering after scrubbing the tag, use an old toothbrush to clean the letters. As an optional extra, give your tag additional shine by polishing it with natural ingredients, like ketchup for brass tags or olive oil if it’s made of stainless steel. Once you’re finished, dry the tag with a towel before reattaching it to your dog’s collar.

73278.question: How To Install Wire Fencing for Dogs
73278.gt: To install wire fencing for dogs, start by driving metal posts into the ground approximately 15 feet apart with a sledgehammer. Then, secure the wire to the first post using the metal clips that are attached to the post. 73357.question: How To Dry Figs
73357.gt: To dry figs, start by cutting them in half with a knife. Then, place the figs on an oven-safe rack with ventilation holes so the cut sides are facing up. Next, set your oven to the lowest temperature setting and put the figs inside of it. Let the figs dry in the oven with the door propped open for up to 36 hours. 73392.question: How To Clean a Marble Shower
73392.gt: To clean a marble shower, start by filling a spray bottle with warm water and a teaspoon of mild, pH-neutral dish soap. Then, spray your shower with the solution and rub it in with a damp cloth using small, circular motions. Once you've gone over the entire surface of your shower, rinse the solution off with water. Finally, dry your marble shower off using a rag or squeegee.

73418.question: How To Clean Soap Scum from Glass Shower Doors
73418.gt: If you have soap scum on your glass shower doors, you can easily clean it off with a homemade cleaner. Let the mixture sit for 30 minutes to cool, spray your shower doors with it, and wipe it away with a clean microfiber cloth. Alternatively, you can mix 1/2 cup baking soda and 1/4 cup white vinegar into a paste and rub this on your shower doors. Leave it for 15 minutes to work its magic, then wipe it off. You can also use toilet bowl cleaner instead if you have this on hand, although it's not as effective as the other cleaners.

73788.question: How To Make Turkey Cupcakes
73788.gt: To make turkey cupcakes, beat the butter, vanilla, cocoa powder, milk, and sugar on low speed until the chocolate frosting is thick enough to spread. 73856.question: How To Care for Poinsettias
73856.gt: To care for a poinsettia, first, choose a spot where your poinsettia can get 6 hours of indirect sunlight each day. For example, set it near a sunny window facing east or west. Try to keep the temperature around 70°F (21°C), and make sure it never gets colder than 50°F (10°C) since it's leaves could fall off if it gets too cold. Poinsettias don’t need a lot of water, but you should water your plant when the soil feels dry. As you water the poinsettia, stop as soon as you see water leak through the holes at the bottom to the pot. This will prevent overwatering. Poinsettias only bloom from November to March, so most people prefer to buy a new one every year for the holidays. If you’d prefer to keep your poinsettia year round, fertilize it with an all-purpose fertilizer in early January.

73887.question: How To Get Wisteria to Bloom
73887.gt: If you want to help your wisterias bloom, prune the branches on a mild day in February, then again to tame unruly growth in July. Use garden shears to prune long shoots so there are only 3-5 buds per shoot, and aim to cut away about half of the previous year’s growth. However, avoid cutting the woody frame of the plant. In the early spring, around April, add phosphate fertilizer to the ground around the tree, then add compost to the soil, topped by a 2-inch layer of mulch.

73925.question: How To Grow Daylilies
73925.gt: Before growing daylilies, soak bare root plants in a water-soluble fertilizer the night before you plan on planting them. Then, plant the lilies 2 feet apart in a sunny, well-draining spot. 73927.gt: If you want to grow dahlias in pots, choose a pot that's at least 12 inches by 12 inches and fill it with a rich potting mix, like 2 parts compost to 1 part peat moss. Once the tubers are planted, water the soil lightly so it's damp but not soaked, and mix a fertilizer into the top layer of soil. To help your plants grow, place the pot in an area that gets direct sunlight and water at least 2-3 times a week.

73949.question: How To Grow Iris

After that, water your irises thoroughly, then water them every 7-10 days until the weather turns cool. Additionally, check your irises periodically for brown leaves or stalks, and remove them to keep your flowers healthy.

73951.question: How To Grow Lavender
73951.gt: To grow lavender, start by digging a hole in a spot with good drainage and full sun. Then, line the base of the hole with a mix of lime, manure, and bone meal. Just before you plant the lavender, remove it gently from its pot and shake the soil from the roots. Next, place the plant in the hole you prepared and cover the roots with soil. Finally, cover the area with mulch to prevent weeds and water the lavender every 10 days.

74328.question: How To Make a Moscow Mule
74328.gt: To make a Moscow Mule, fill a Collins glass, which is a tall, straight glass, about halfway with ice. Then, squeeze the juice of 1/2 a lime into the glass before throwing in the rind. Pour in 2 fluid ounces of vodka and 5 fluid ounces of ginger beer, then garnish with a wedge of lime to the side of the glass. Serve immediately!

74608.question: How To Restore an Old Car

74761.question: How To Make a Pipe Out of a Pen
74761.gt: If you want to make a pipe out of a pen, start by finding a metal pen with a removable cartridge and metal tip. Next, unscrew the metal tip and slide it off. Hold the case still with your nondominant hand and use your other index finger or thumb to press down on the outer rim of the metal tip until it's securely in place. This will be the bowl of the pipe. You can add a cigarette filter at the opening on the other end if you prefer a less harsh smoke. Otherwise, this pipe is ready to go!

74903.question: How To Clean Baby Toys
74903.gt: To clean baby toys, machine wash and dry any plush toys unless the label says not to. In that case, you can spot clean plush toys using dish soap and a wet cloth. To clean plastic, wooden, or metal toys, wipe them down with soap and water. Scrub any tough stains you encounter with baking soda, dish soap, and vinegar. 75279.question: How To Use a Dehumidifier
75279.gt: To use your dehumidifier, put it in the most humid room in your house, like the bathroom, laundry room, or basement. Try to place your dehumidifier as close to the center of the room as you can, or at least 6-12 inches away from walls and furniture, since it will work better when there’s good air flow around it. Run your dehumidifier in the summer with the room’s doors and windows closed. If your machine drains through a hose, place the hose securely in a sink or tub. Otherwise, remember to empty the water reservoir tray regularly.

75317.question: How To Make Ambrosia
75317.gt: To make an ambrosia salad, start by washing your grapes and draining the canned fruit. In a mixing bowl, combine sour cream and whipped topping using a spoon. 76554.question: How To Grow Hydroponic Tomatoes
76554.gt: To grow hydroponic tomatoes, start your tomato seeds in a nursery tray using rock wool or coconut coir soil. 76558.question: How To Grow Cherry Tomatoes
76558.gt: To grow cherry tomatoes, choose a sunny spot for your planter or garden plot. If you plant from seeds, you can start them indoors for 8-10 weeks before the last average frost date. Once outside, they’ll need 2-3 months of warm weather to grow. You’ll also want to place cages in the garden or planter to help support the plant’s weight. Water your tomato plant every few days to keep the soil moist, and fertilize once a week to give the plant nutrition to grow.

76655.question: How To Clear a Clogged Waste Pipe
76655.gt: One way to clear a clogged waste pipe is by using chemicals. To use an at-home mixture, start by pouring a pot of boiling water down the drain, and then pour ½ cup of baking soda down the drain. Let the baking soda sit for 5 minutes, and then pour 1 cup of vinegar and 1 cup of hot water down the drain. Let it sit for 10 minutes, and then pour another pot of boiling water down the drain to flush away the clog that has been loosened by the chemicals.
76655.pred: To clear a clogged waste pipe, you can use a vacuum cleaner to suck out the blockage. First, remove the vacuum cleaner hose from the machine and attach it to the clogged pipe. Then, turn on the vacuum cleaner and let it suck out the blockage. If the vacuum cleaner is not powerful enough, you can use a plunger to create suction and dislodge the blockage. Finally, turn off the vacuum cleaner and check if the pipe is clear.

77721.question: How To Make Irish Coffee
77721.gt: To make Irish coffee, start by filling a mug with hot water and letting it sit for a few minutes to warm the mug. Then, dump out the water, fill the mug 3/4 full with freshly brewed coffee, and stir in 1 tablespoon of sugar. Once the sugar has dissolved, add 1 jigger of Irish whiskey and gently stir until it’s fully incorporated. Finally, top the coffee with a dollop of whipped cream.

78446.question: How To Make a S'more
78446.gt: If you want to make a S’more over a fire, break a graham cracker in half. Place a piece of chocolate on one half of the graham cracker, then place your marshmallow on a clean skewer. Carefully hold the marshmallow over the fire, turning it slowly until it’s evenly roasted. Once your marshmallow is nicely toasted, place it on top of the chocolate, then place the plain graham cracker on top of the marshmallow, remove the skewer, and enjoy your S’more!
78446.pred: To make a s'more, you will need a graham cracker, a marshmallow, and a piece of chocolate. First, place a graham cracker on a plate. Then, place a marshmallow on top of the graham cracker. Next, place a piece of chocolate on top of the marshmallow. Finally, place another graham cracker on top of the chocolate. Enjoy your delicious s'more!

78977.question: How To Get Rid of Centipedes
78977.gt: To get rid of centipedes, try sprinkling some cayenne pepper around the entryways to your home, which will deter the centipedes so they don't come inside. You can also try setting up some sticky traps on the floors around your home to catch the centipedes when they walk on them. If the centipedes persist, sprinkle a natural pesticide, like boric acid or diatomaceous earth, over the areas where you usually spot them.
78977.pred: To get rid of centipedes, you can use a variety of methods. First, you can try to catch them in a jar and release them outside. You can also use mothballs, which are effective in repelling centipedes. However, be careful as mothballs are not safe for youngsters and pets. Additionally, you can use herbal leaves like indica, mongoose urine, or kingsnake to repel centipedes. It is also important to reduce humidity in your home by using a dehumidifier, keeping the grass in your garden dry, and using door-sealing products to avoid entry.

78979.question: How To Get Rid of Silverfish
78979.gt: To get rid of silverfish, vacuum your home thoroughly to remove eggs that might be hiding in carpets, floorboards, and hard-to-reach corners and crevices. For an easy, non-toxic way to kill silverfish, sprinkle some diatomaceous earth in places where you’ve seen them, like under the sink, in the basement, and in the back of cabinets. Diatomaceous earth is a powder that will dry out and kill silverfish when they come into contact with it. Though it is non-toxic, make sure to keep it away from children and pets. Place commercial silverfish traps throughout your home to catch even more silverfish. To prevent silverfish from entering your home, seal up any cracks around doors and windows with caulk. Use a dehumidifier if your home is humid since silverfish thrive in wet environments. You should also keep dry foods like pasta, rice, and cereal in sealed containers to cut off their food source. Finally, remove any stacks of papers, books, or magazines around your home since silverfish like to hide in them.
78979.pred: To get rid of silverfish, you can use a spray bottle with water and orange essential oil. The video suggests that this method is effective and does not require an exterminator or harsh chemicals.

78985.question: How To Use Home Remedies to Get Rid of Gnats
78985.gt: To get rid of gnats using home remedies, start by filling a jar halfway with apple cider vinegar. Then, cover the top of the jar with plastic wrap and secure it with a rubber band so there are no gaps between the plastic and glass. Next, use a toothpick or fork to poke a few small holes into the plastic wrap so the gnats can smell the vinegar and fly into the jar. Finally, place the jar where there are a lot of gnats, then empty and refill the jar every couple days until they’re gone.
78985.pred: To get rid of gnats using home remedies, you can use honey trap, apple cider vinegar, cinnamon, and baking soda. Sprinkle cinnamon powder on plantation areas to control larvae and fungus gnats. Lastly, mix baking soda, liquid dish soap, and water to create a spray for affected areas.

79178.question: How To Make Homemade Chalk
79178.gt: To make homemade chalk using cornstarch, line a toilet paper roll with a piece of wax paper, making sure the waxed side is exposed. Cover the bottom of the tube with masking tape so the chalk can’t leak out. Next, mix equal parts cornstarch and water in a bowl, and add food coloring if you want to make colored chalk. Use a spoon to transfer the chalk mixture into the tube, then cover the whole tube with wax paper. Let the chalk dry for 12 hours, then remove it from the molds and have fun with your new creation!

79262.question: How To Make a Fuzzy Navel
79262.gt: To make a basic fuzzy navel, start by filling a highball glass with ice. If you don’t have a highball glass, use a tall, skinny glass or plastic cup. Next, pour in 2 fluid ounces of peach schnapps, then fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Alternatively, shake the ice, peach schnapps, and orange juice in a cocktail shaker. Then, pour the contents into a glass without the ice.

1. Fill a glass with ice.
2. Pour in 1 ounce of orange juice.
3. Pour in 1 ounce of vodka.
4. Stir the drink.
5. Garnish with an orange slice.
6. Serve and enjoy!

79281.question: How To Make an Amaretto Sour
79281.gt: To make an easy amaretto sour cocktail, half-fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Then, add 1 and 1/2 fluid ounces of amaretto and 3/4 to 1 and 1/2 fluid ounces of sweet and sour mix -- the less sweet and sour mix you use, the nuttier your cocktail will be. To finish, simply shake and pour. You can garnish your drink with orange or lemon slices or a maraschino cherry.
79281.pred: To make an amaretto sour, you will need the following ingredients: 1 1/2 oz amaretto, 1/2 oz lemon juice, 1/2 oz simple syrup, and a dash of Angostura bitters. First, fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Then, add the amaretto, lemon juice, simple syrup, and bitters to the shaker. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. After shaking, strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or cherry, if desired. Enjoy your delicious amaretto sour!

79968.question: How To Make a Chinese Hot Pot
79968.gt: To make a Chinese hot pot, start by preparing your favorite broth in a large pot or wok so that everyone can easily dip their ingredients into it. Next, thinly slice your choice of meats, like beef, pork, or fish, or protein-rich meat substitutes, like tofu. Then, select and chop up a variety of vegetables like watercress, bok choy, mushrooms, cabbage, lettuce, and snow peas. Finally, prepare plenty of noodles or rice and serve the array of ingredients alongside the hot pot.

Once the ingredients are cooked, transfer them to a pot and add water. Bring the pot to a boil and let it simmer for a few minutes. Finally, serve the hot pot with your favorite dipping sauce and enjoy!

79985.question: How To Make Chinese Brown Sauce
79985.gt: To make Chinese brown sauce, combine 4 tablespoons of soy sauce, 3 tablespoons of sugar, 1 tablespoon of ginger, 1 1/2 cups of broth, and 1 tablespoon of cornstarch in a mixing bowl. Next, add a tablespoon of oil to a wok and position the wok over medium heat. Then, stir fry 1-3 cloves of garlic for 10-15 seconds before whisking in the soy sauce mixture. Finally, let the mixture come to a boil, add your favorite meat or veggies, and continue cooking the sauce for 5-10 minutes until it thickens.

After mixing all the ingredients together, strain the mixture to remove the roots.

81724.question: How To Get Rid of Aphids on Roses Organically
81724.gt: To get rid of aphids on your roses organically, try watering them more thoroughly. Spray your roses with water in the morning to rinse the aphids off as well as give your plant time to dry in the sun to avoid fungus. When watering, make sure to get the underside of the leaves too since aphids tend to hang out there to stay out of the sun. Repeat this process daily for 1 to 2 weeks. You can also try making your own organic repellent spray using garlic a garlic. First, crush a full head of garlic and steep it in 2 cups of hot water for 24 hours. Add 1 tablespoon of dish soap to the garlic-infused water before spraying it on your plants.

81892.question: How To Fold a Spring Roll
81892.gt: To fold a spring roll, try using the burrito method. First, lay the wrap out flat on a plate. Then, place the fillings near the bottom of the wrap in a line that’s approximately ½ to ⅔ inches tall. Fold each side of the wrap over the filling and bring the bottom of the wrap up over the filling. Roll the wrap upward to the opposite edge and then use an egg mixture to hold the wrap together.

81932.question: How To Make Lumpia
81932.gt: If you want to make lumpia, or a Filipino spring roll, brown your ground beef in a skillet, then drain the meat and add your vegetables and seasonings to the skillet and remove from heat. Place a lumpia wrapper on a flat surface, then spoon in the mixture, leaving 1.5 inches of space at both ends of the wrapper. Grab the corner nearest the filling, then fold it over the filling and roll the wrapper about halfway. Tuck in the ends, then continue rolling tightly. Add a little water to the edge of the wrapper to seal it, than cook in hot oil for 1-2 minutes.

81987.question: How To Make Parmesan Crisps
81987.gt: Before baking your Parmesan crisps, preheat your oven to 400 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Then, place tablespoon-sized mounds of coarsely-grated Parmesan cheese on the baking sheet. Using the back of a spoon, flatten the mounds gently until they’re about 2 to 4 inches wide. Bake your crisps in the center rack of your oven for 3 to 5 minutes, adding 1 to 3 more minutes if they’re not golden or crunchy enough.

82298.question: How To Set Spider Traps
82298.gt: The easiest way to trap spiders in your home is by setting up a sticky trap. All you need to do is put something sticky on top of a flat object, like some double-sided tape on a piece of card. Alternatively, you can buy ready-made sticky traps from a hardware store. Place your traps in dark places where spiders may hide, like under the utility sink or the water heater. You can also place a bottle lid filled with water next to your trap, since spiders are attracted by water. Another good place for your traps is beside baseboards, since spiders and insects like to walk along them.
82298.pred: To set spider traps, you will need a roll of tape and a piece of paper. First, take a piece of paper and cut it into a long strip. Then, take a roll of tape and cut a piece of tape that is the same length as the paper strip. Next, take the paper strip and wrap it around the tape, making sure that the paper is on the outside. Finally, place the tape with the paper on it on a surface where you want to trap a spider. The spider will be attracted to the paper and will get stuck on the tape.

82719.question: How To Make Pho
82719.gt: To make your own pho, cut your choice of beef into bite-sized pieces. If you like, you can fry it lightly, but it should still be rare. For the best pho, make your own beef broth by simmering bones and cuts of beef for several hours, although if you’re in a hurry you can use a premade broth. Add charred onions and ginger to your broth. In a separate pan, boil your rice noodles, then steam your choice of vegetables and add them to the broth. Serve with cilantro, sriracha, and hoisin sauce.

Next, prepare the noodles by cutting them into thin strips and frying them in hot oil. Finally, serve the pho in a bowl with the noodles, and enjoy!

83198.question: How To Build a Japanese Garden
83198.gt: Building a Japanese garden can be a great way to create a space to relax in your yard. If you want to create a zen garden, you’ll need to flatten out a square piece of land and surround the area with rocks. Then, cover the square with sand and gravel. You can add a few simple plants, like moss and small trees. Rake through your sand or gravel surface to create grooves that look like water, which creates a relaxing feel. Alternatively, try building a tea garden, which is used for performing tea ceremonies. Tea gardens are divided by a wall of rocks or a small gate into 2 areas, known as the inner and outer garden. The outer area of your garden should have a pathway to your inner garden, and contain a few shrubs and plants. You should also place a water basin between the 2 gardens, which visitors use to cleanse themselves before entering the inner garden. In your inner garden, you’ll want to build a tea house and have natural plants, such as ferns, mosses, and shrubs.
83198.pred: To build a Japanese garden, you can start by laying out a tarp on the ground and digging a hole in the center. Then, you can add rocks and plants to the garden, and use bamboo to create a fence or a water feature. You can also use a rake to smooth out the gravel and create a peaceful atmosphere. Finally, you can add a dog to the garden to make it more enjoyable.

83918.question: How To Level Your Refrigerator
83918.gt: Levelling your refrigerator will help improve its efficiency and only takes a few minutes if you have the right tools. All you’ll need is a bubble level and a screwdriver or wrench. Start by removing the grille at the bottom of your fridge to expose its legs or rollers. Depending on your fridge, you’ll need to adjust these with a screwdriver or wrench. Generally, you’ll need to turn the legs or rollers clockwise to raise them. You want your front legs to be ¼-inch higher than the back to help the coolant drain. Place your bubble level on top of the fridge behind the door to measure the angle.

83937.question: How To Make a New York Egg Cream
83937.gt: To make a New York egg cream, start by adding 1 inch of chocolate syrup to a tall, chilled glass. Then, pour 1 inch of whole milk over the syrup, followed by enough cold soda water to fill the glass to about 1 inch below the rim. Finally, stir everything together with a long spoon and sip on your drink with a straw.
83937.pred: To make a New York egg cream, you will need to boil water, add sugar and cocoa powder, and then pour the mixture into a glass. You can also add milk and ice to the glass.

83939.question: How To Make Cultured Buttermilk
83939.gt: To make cultured buttermilk, start by adding 6-8 ounces of active, fresh cultured buttermilk to a jar. Then, fill the rest of the jar with fresh milk, seal it, and shake it thoroughly. Next, let the jar sit out at room temperature until the milk has thickened, which should take about 24 hours. Finally, once the milk has thickened and is coating the edge of the jar, transfer it to the fridge for storage.
83939.pred: To make cultured buttermilk, you will need to start with a quart of whole milk. Pour the milk into a mason jar and add a tablespoon of buttermilk starter. You can use this cultured buttermilk in your recipes or store it in the refrigerator for up to a week.

83995.question: How To Make Cashew Milk
83995.gt: To make cashew milk, start by soaking some raw cashews in water for 2 hours, which will make your cashew milk creamier. Then, drain the cashews and add them to a blender with some fresh water. Next, blend the cashews and water on high for 1-2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and creamy. Finally, strain the cashew milk through a cheesecloth and store it in the fridge for up to 3 days.
83995.pred: To make cashew milk, you need to soak cashews in water, blend them with water, and strain the mixture.

84228.question: How To Use a Waffle Maker
84228.gt: To use your waffle maker, first plug it in to preheat it, and put cooking spray, butter, or oil on it if it’s not non-stick. When the indicator light shows your waffle maker is hot, pour about ¾ of a cup of batter onto the plate in a spiral, starting from the outside edges. Then close the lid and wait until steam stops coming out before you check your waffles. When your waffles are done, use a plastic, rubber, or silicone utensil to remove them. Finally, let your waffle maker cool completely before you clean it with a soft, damp cloth.
